title: How to Pretend You're Busy in a Zoom Meeting
description: Need to convince your boss you're swamped? Master the art of staring intensely at your screen while you're actually watching rSlash videos. Bonus points for nodding occasionally!

title: Confessions of a Serial Procrastinator: How I Beat the Deadline Blues
description: Spoiler alert: I didn't. But I did discover 20 great new YouTube channels to watch when I should've been working.

title: How to explain to your parents how to use the internet
description: You can't. It's impossible. Give up on this dream.

title: Confessions of a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle
